Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Speaking of which, Huck told me that you
kept our food safe from monsters. <sp:5:1:0>That
was a very kind gesture.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to you, it's looking like we'll have
a little extra stocked up.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice_00>Hey, you wouldn't happen to have any
spare food you'd be willing to part with,
would you?<sp:0:4:0>Our food stockpiles are looking healthier
now that the blizzard has stopped, but
they could still be better.<sp:0:4:0>If you have extra food, I'd be happy to
<clr:0000>trade<clr:ffff> you for some supplies.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I could offer you, say, <clr:0000>10 arrows <clr:ffff>for<clr:0000>
three glowing cave fish<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>They're not
hard to find if you look in caves.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_01>I see...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, if you change your mind, that offer
of food for <clr:0000>arrows<clr:ffff> is always open.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>If you ever do come across any spare
<clr:0000>glowing cave fish<clr:ffff>, I'll take three of them
in exchange for <clr:0000>arrows<clr:ffff> anytime.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Right now we just need to secure as
much food as possible.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you can spare <clr:0000>three glowing cave fish<clr:ffff>,
I'll give you <clr:0000>10 arrows <clr:ffff>in return. They're
not hard to find if you look in caves.
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>Ah! So you're carrying at least <clr:0000>three
glowing cave fish<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Would you like to
exchange them for<clr:0000> 10 arrows<clr:ffff>?
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>Thank you. That really helps! Here's <clr:0000>10
arrows<clr:ffff>, as promised.
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sigh_00>Ah, never mind me. <sp:5:1:0>I was just thinking
about a friend of mine who hasn't come
back yet.
Talk05_00_00: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Ah, so you don't have enough right now.
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Oh, yes! <sp:5:0:0>Do you have any other spare
food on you?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Chillfin trout <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>brightcaps <clr:ffff>are the little
ones' favorite foods, so we can never get
enough around here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>If you come across extra of either of
those, bring them to me and I'll give you
more <clr:0000>arrows<clr:ffff> in exchange.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks in advance!
Talk05_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>But I guess you don't have very many
right now.
Talk00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hey!<sp:0:4:0>You're the one who helped Tulin save the
village. <sp:5:0:0>We owe you big for that!
Talk00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I think we met at Tabantha Bridge Stable.
Do you remember me?<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>I couldn't have imagined then that you'd
be the one to save our village!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that the blizzard's died down, we're
stockpiling all the food and materials we
used to have in abundance.<sp:0:4:0>The others are all working together to
bring supplies to the village. I'm managing
the whole process from here.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Speaking of which... <sp:5:1:0>Huck was supposed
to bring me some food, but I haven't
seen him.<sp:0:4:0>He told me he'd collect food from
<clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff> in the Tabantha
Tundra, northeast of here.<sp:0:4:0><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I hope nothing happened to him <clr:0000>on his
way back to the village<clr:ffff>.
